overview: During a trek in the mountains of Patagonia, Aye discovers that her boyfriend Hernán is not who she thinks she is, and begins to develop a closer relationship with Newen, the mountain guide they hired.  Hernán realizes that something is wrong with Aye, but he does not understand what it is about. As they go up the mountain, things get complicated.  A Condor flies over the mountains in search of Carrion to feed his chicks and narrates what he sees from his own worldview in Günün to Jatüch.  He begins to follow a lonely human who apparently doesn't have much time left.
tagline: A human story told by condors
title: El exterior
